Headline: No Red Line trains between 95th/Dan Ryan and Garfield
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th/Dan Ryan and Garfield due to a police investigation at 69th/Dan Ryan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th/Dan Ryan and Garfield due to a police investigation at 69th/Dan Ryan.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and Garfield at this time.

  • Shuttle buses are available from Garfield to 95th/Dan Ryan to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #29 State
  • #30 South Chicago
  • #67 67th/69th/71st 
  • #71 71st/South Shore 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
